text: Zunui ta ɠa ɗa-masadai zu, nii gala ɲadegaiti ti-yɛnvui su. È-ɠɛɛ ná-siɛgi zu, tɔ ɠa é ɠɛni faiti suɠalasu, keleɠelegɛ ta ɠimalai veeʋɛ bɛ, eɠɛ galagiti ta-ɠimalai ɠɛʋele. Naa ɠa é kɛɛni è-ɠɛɛ, masagi Neɓukadenɛzaal kɛɛni ga molikula nuiti ta-ɠundiɠii, ta kpaamaazu zoɠoiti, ta adɔɓɛɛ nuiti, ta somideɠa adɔɓɛɛ nuiti.
